casebody.data:
Sophie E. Minton, Respondent, v. The New York Elevated Railroad Company, et al., Appellants. Decided January 6, 1890. Appeal by defendants from judgment entered upon the decision of a judge at special term. George V. N. Baldwin, for respondent. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants.

Before Freedman and Ingraham, JJ.

Per Curiam.

The judgment should be affirmed with costs.
